string.name: mct_wifi_disabled_network_failure
string.comment: Application label: Avoided poor Internet connection

string.name: mct_wifi_conn_error_text
string.comment: Application label: This network may not be enabled for content transfer. Please select a different Wi-Fi network and retry scan.

resources.string: This network may not be enabled for content transfer. Please select a different Wi-Fi network and retry scan.

string.name: mct_add_wifi_network
string.comment: SetupWiFiNetwork screen, label: Add Wi-Fi Network

string.name: mct_wifi_enter_ssid
string.comment: SetupWiFiNetwork screen, label: Enter the SSID

string.name: mct_wifi_saving_text
string.comment: SetupWiFiNetwork screen, label: Saving will enable your device to automatically connect to this network when in range.

resources.string: Saving will enable your device to automatically connect to this network when in range.

string.name: mct_select_wifi_network
string.comment: SelectWiFiNetwork screen, label: Select Wi-Fi Options

string.name: mct_no_wifi_networks_found_text
string.comment: SelectWiFiNetwork screen, label: Connect later when a network is in range, or manually add a network.

resources.string: Connect later when a network is in range, or manually add a network.

string.name: mct_wifi_fail_to_scan
string.comment: SelectWiFiNetwork screen, label: Can\'t scan for networks

string.name: mct_no_wifi_networks_found
string.comment: SelectWiFiNetwork screen, label: No Wi-Fi Options

string.name: mct_wifi_empty_list_wifi_off
string.comment: SelectWiFiNetwork screen, label: To see available networks, turn Wi-Fi on.

resources.string: To see available networks, turn Wi-Fi on.

string.name: mct_content_summary_error_network
string.comment: Transfer summary adapter: These files did not transfer because of Network Disconnection

resources.string: These files did not transfer because of Network Disconnection

string.name: mct_content_summary_error_default
string.comment: Transfer summary adapter: These files did not transfer because of Insufficient Space

resources.string: These files did not transfer because of Insufficient Space

string.name: mct_messaging_send_sms_message
string.comment: Application label. To send a message you need to change back to your default messaging application.

resources.string: To send a message you need to change back to your default messaging application.

string.name: mct_messaging_sms_restore_ongoing_text
string.comment: Application label. SMS reply text: If you need to reply with a message, tap Change SMS app to switch back to your previous messaging (SMS) app.\n\n If restoring not finished, that will cancel your restore.

resources.string: If you need to reply with a message, tap Change SMS app to switch back to your previous messaging (SMS) app.\n\n If restoring not finished, that will cancel your restore.

string.name: mct_messaging_message_restore_finished
string.comment: Application label. SMS/MMS new message: Messages restore finished

string.comment: Notification label. MMS new message details: Size: %1$d Expires: %2$s

string.comment: Notification label. SMS/MMS new message: New message from %s
